markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Deity's Domain](/Feats.aspx?ID=5902) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 96 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Deity's Domain](/Feats.aspx?ID=5883)

</column>

---

Through your conviction, you have glimpsed the deeper secrets of your deity's domain. You gain an advanced domain spell from the domain you chose with Deity's Domain as a devotion spell.
name: Advanced Deity's Domain
